title: Scalped: Casino Boogie
description: Fifteen years ago, Dashiell "Dash" Bad Horse ran away from a life of abject poverty and utter hopelessness on the Prairie Rose Indian Reservation searching for something better. Now he's come back home armed with nothing but a set of nunchuks, a hell-bent-for-leather attitude and one dark secret, to find nothing much has changed on "the Rez" — short of a glimmering new casino, and a once-proud people overcome by drugs and organized crime.This volume explores Dash Bad Horse's troubled origin and chronicles his day-to-day life on 'the Rez" working for Chief Red Crow.Collects: Scalped #6–11
author: Jason Aaron
